name: Mini Jam 9, Back To School: Super School Navigator
name_original: Mini Jam 9, Back To School: Super School Navigator
description:
Source: https://github.com/Lomomn/MiniJam9 

A game where you have to look at the scribbled down note to find which classroom you have to get to. Avoid the bully! Don't touch walls!

Use "A" and "D" or the arrow keys to steer your guy to his destination. Hit both at the same time to stop moving!

The idea sounded much better in my head, but I'm still glad I went through with it. Next time I'll try to partner up with a sound person and I'll also use the community graphics pack.
